title: Organic Green Tea
author: John
description: Premium organic green tea leaves, rich in antioxidants and offering a smooth, refreshing taste.

title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
author: Micheal
description: Eco-friendly, double-walled insulated water bottle. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

title: Bamboo Cutting Board
author: Tom
description: Durable and sustainable bamboo cutting board with juice groove. Perfect for meal prep and serving.

title: Reusable Produce Bags
author: Lisa
description: Set of 5 mesh produce bags. Washable and perfect for grocery shopping and storing fruits and vegetables.

title: Solar-Powered Charger
author: James
description: Portable solar charger with dual USB ports. Ideal for outdoor activities and emergency preparedness.
